title: Best early Black Friday Apple deals
content:
Macworld

If you’re looking for an Apple deal, there’s no better time to get one than Black Friday weekend. No matter what you’re looking to buy, you are likely to find a great price on it—possibly the lowest ever.

And while sales have been going on all throughout November, the best ones are this week—Black Friday through Cyber Monday. We’re already seeing all-time low prices on iPads, MacBooks, and AirPods, and we expect to see the deals continue all throughout the weekend. So keep checking this page for the very best deals.

Black Friday 2023: Best Apple deals in the U.S.

We’re constantly tracking the best Apple deals, so stay tuned to this list for the best bargains we find on Macs, iPads, iPhones, AirPods, Apple WAtches and more.

Black Friday 2023: Apple’s shopping event

Every year Apple holds shopping event from Black Friday (November 24) to Cyber Monday (November 27). However, since Apple rarely discounts its products, the event consists of gift card offers rather than actual savings. The newest products are excluded, so don’t expect any offers on the iPhone 15 or M3 MacBooks, but the Apple Watch Series 9 is included this year.

In 2023 you can get gift cards for the following amounts with the following purchases made on Apple’s U.S. site or Apple’s U.K. site.

Black Friday 2023: Where to shop for Apple deals

Stay tuned to Macworld throughout November to find the best deals as they arrive. But if you’re looking for a specific color or capacity, you can check out the following retailers. In the U.S., here are the best stores to shop for Black Friday deals:

  • Apple
  • Amazon
  • Best Buy
  • Costco
  • Target
  • Walmart

If you’re based in the U.K., you’ll find deals at the following shops:

  • Apple
  • AO.com
  • Amazon
  • Argos
  • Carphone Warehouse
  • Currys
  • eBuyer
  • John Lewis
  • KRCS
  • Laptops Direct
  • Very
